archimate:DataObject.name: AtomicSecVulScoringMetricDefn
archimate:DataObject.documentation: A type of SecurityVulnerabilityMetricDefn that does not have any subordinate SecurityVulnerabilityMetricDefns; that is; an AtomicSecurityVulnerabilityMetricDefn is a leaf-level SecurityVulnerabilityMetric. Notes: Examples include Base Metrics - Access Vector; Authentication; and Access Complexity.
